name: 30 Degrees
description:
The beautiful world.. Sounds of singing love birds and amaziiiii....(No input identified)..❌error 213... System.Shutdown();

Yeah this kind of stories happen to us always when it comes to the deadlines. In the world of 30 Degrees, you will feel deadline breathing right behind your neck and your scariest fears come alive... Broken art and never ending bugs.

Good luck with fixing issues and don't forget... YOU HAVE A DEADLINE⏰

Credits:
